website_summaries.verdict: A riff on the traditional design of a long barrister's case, this model boasts 10 cubbyholes and a unique, attractive appearance.
pros: Owners (and their guests) are impressed with the case's storage capacity, appearance, and sturdiness
Label holders add a vintage touch
cons: Unlike other cases we tested, the shelf heights can't be adjusted
Assembly is a slow process and may require two people

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this bookcase! It fits perfectly in a little nook in my bedroom. The unit was pretty easy to put together, I've done much more difficult with IKEA. It took me about 1.5 hrs total, while my husband carted all my books from downstairs to our upstairs bedroom. I really like how it turned out!!
customer_reviews.author: Addie W

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to standard 5 shelf bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Even more beautiful in person. Nice, thick, firm, sturdy material. Fairly simple to assemble (took about 2-3 hours). Top has a nice border along the back and sides, perfect for showcasing belongings on top. Purchased matching pieces, though have not yet assembled those. Highly recommend. Also, shelves are deep, so you can do two rows of books per cubby, or use for just about anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Griwicki

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE with assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst piece of furniture for assembly I have ever experienced. I followed the instructions completely, had help with assembly for part of the 8 hours or so I tried to assemble, and the bookcase still fell apart. The weight of the wood is simply too heavy for the cams provided. And the wood was damaged in the holes where the cams pulled through. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE, and I am a few days outside the return window. Right now, I would pay someone to come pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cubby baskets that DO fit inside this shelf!
customer_reviews.text: We just assembled this. I agree with all the positive reviews. The only addition I would like to make is the cubby baskets I purchased to go with this. I used the following and they work great! See the attached picture (it is inside a toy closet and the color looks very yellow...it's just bad lighting...it really does look great in the space).  Brand: Simplify Product Name: Storage Cube Color: Faux Jute Amazon didn't have many in stock and I found mine online at Kohl's. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: 3xmommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entry way piece
customer_reviews.text: This took forever to put together but if you lay each piece out it gets a lot easier. I did this without any help. It's very sturdy, level and it looks great as a hallway piece in my new house. I would highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to build, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I own a couple pieces from Sauder, and I really like all of them. I am a female who normally does not build things, but I was able to get it together in a couple of hours on my own. It is rather heavy though, and I would definitely recommend two people. It looks wonderful and is very sturdy. It's not solid wood, but does not look like the cheap junk you would get at Walmart or somewhere. Totally worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla I

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Construction
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my space at just under 54" wide. Not many bookcases out there in that size. Was pretty easy to put together by myself (lady over 60), but I am handy with tools. Took me a couple of hours. Sturdy and holds a lot of heavy books without sagging. Reasons for not giving 5 stars is a few edges were dinged in shipping and not happy with the color, not as rich a brown as the picture, a little grayer and doesn't match as well with other woods in my room as I thought it would. Wish it came in white.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bookshelf. It's quality is wonderful! It has plenty of space. It looks nice. It took a while to build but not hard, just a lot of pieces. I have it in the hallway upstairs by the kids' rooms and it looks just as I had imagined!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal N.

customer_reviews.title: Received broken
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bookcase but be careful when opening to save box. I bought two of these I received one perfect condition and one broken. The only option available is to repackage it all and send to ups. And these things weigh quite a bit. And I didn't save box so yeah looks like I'm sol.
customer_reviews.author: christopher decker

customer_reviews.title: BEST bookcase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bookcase! Even though it isn't real wood, it still looks like it and the faux finish is done quite well. The little plates give the bookcase a nice antique touch that I was looking for. It also accommodated all of my books with room to spare (I have over 100 books!). Everyone that sees it comments on how cute it is. I am more than happy with the purchase and would purchase another one if I had the money and space!
customer_reviews.author: KSM

customer_reviews.title: I really love the Sauder Salted/Grey/Ash Oak line of colors
customer_reviews.text: I really love the Sauder Salted/Grey/Ash Oak line of colors. The gray goes very well with my flooring and my style. I was a little scared of this one because it does look a little brown, but in person, it is a nice gray. I am using this for storing my kitchen tools like big bowls, a blender, a dutch oven, etc. and it seems to be holding up just fine. I live in Nevada and dust is something that just cannot be avoided which is why I love this color because dust doesn't show up very well on this color. Overall I am very happy with the product and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Zimika

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but very poor quality. Not study at all. Not made of solid wood. You're better off going to a furniture store
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Really warm up my fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful pieces of furniture, we bought two to go on either side of our fire place. I love them. They have some minor imperfections but for the price you absolutely cannot beat these. Con: the instructions, whoever wrote them does not know how to communicate. My husband builds furniture as a hobby, he said it was horrible, I agree. Just take your time, layout all the pieces and think about the end game.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: Although it took me quite some time to put this bookcase together, the time spent was well worth it. I love this piece. It's large and fits the decor in my house, which is rustic and eclectic. The color is as shown in the photos, perhaps less grey-- although my home is dimly lit, which makes the shelf appear darker where its positioned. It took me about 2.5 hours to put this together on my own, I'm a small person, but I'm pretty handy. Some of the directions were confusing-- hence the 2.5 building time. If I ever have space for another bookcase, I will search again for this one and purchase it if it remains available.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Sauder makes amazing furniture -- this is our second "large" piece from them, and they both look amazing.
customer_reviews.text: As always, super satisfied and impressed with the quality of Sauder. This looks amazing when put together; it took me about 4 hours to get it setup, start-to-finish. Their customer support is amazing as well. We had a piece delivered with a gash in it (in a spot that you actually can't even see when assembled); I contacted their support, they offered to send a new piece for free or give us a coupon for $20 off our next Sauder purchase. We went with the coupon.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Toy storage dream!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this and thought it looked a little more sophisticated than the regular cube storage organizers. Since it’s in my living room I wanted something a little nicer. A couple corners were damaged during shipping but luckily they ended up getting hidden once it was assembled. I can fit a ton of my daughter’s toys in here and it’s a solid, heavy piece that feels sturdy. When I bought this, it was around $200 and that’s a fair price and helped cushion the blow of the shipping damages. Overall I do like it and would recommend. The blue boxes and seagrass baskets are from the container store and fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and affordable book (or whatever-you-want-to-put-on-them) shelves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to hold books, and I absolutely love them. They are heavy and sturdy, and solid enough that I didn't have any reservations stuffing them to capacity with my books. Looking closely at them, they won't fool you to thinking that they are real wood, but they do have a really nice appearance and aren't easily scratched by things like rambunctious cat claws. The scribed design adds to the visual appeal. They are also deep enough to hold more than books; I've just purchased another one to put in my closet in lieu of installing shelves for my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: JanelleG

customer_reviews.title: Materials failure
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to put in a new home office. Three months later I noticed that one of the side pieces was broken in half. My fault, No refund possible. Put it together and two of the hidden screw pockets failed and separated. Continued to finish the project and one of the other pieces split. Finished the project. Looks great. Difficult to put together with particle. board pieces breaking and waiting for glue to set. Particle board failure made this project an unhappy experience. Gave it a 3 because it does look good otherwise it would have gotten 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: DctR

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, but difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put together. Pieces were not identified very well. When put together, the bookshelf is not super solid. I ended up putting plywood over the back, and it made it more solid. The pre- drilled holes did not line up exactly, and one piece had no holes where there were supposed to be holes. Thank goodness I know how to operate power tools.
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: The Best of its Kind!
customer_reviews.text: VERY well made for what it is, which is veneered particle board. The hardware is good quality, and all the holes are pre-drilled and correctly positioned/sized (unlike the Wal-Mart sideboard with metal braces with incorrect drilling so that I had to epoxy it together!). Piece is wobbly until the back is nailed on, at which point it becomes rock solid. I however had to turn it end-over-end to position it in my cramped house BEFORE the back was attached, and though it flexed it didn't crack. Beautiful and solid shelving; I bought two smaller Sauder bookcases after the success of this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Walkingheart

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged-Problem resolved
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy and sturdy. Too heavy to return, which I would love to do because it arrived with two chunks of particle board missing out of the side and top of the unit, both visible locations. Assembly directions missed a step in writing and diagram, but I noticed and used common sense. I have contacted Sauder customer service and asked to replace damaged pieces. Will edit this review when I hear back. Item cost too much money to arrive damaged and to be left out in the rain. UPDATE: I contacted Sauder customer service, who responded promptly and sent a replacement piece right away. Upgraded to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: eb

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of inexpensive furniture.
customer_reviews.text: This is a library type book case. It's inexpensive (particle board with wood grain vinyl finish) but attractive and very sturdy when assembled. The item is well engineered and designed. The parts are all accurately made and the fasteners well thought out and are precisely located. The most surprising and refreshing part of the book case was the instructions which were in English and very clear and precise. The fasteners were packaged together in separate marked sections of a plastic pouch. The book case looks exactly like the picture on Amazon. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: Love it - sturdy and not hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’sa lot bigger than I thought it would be but it’s perfect, sturdy, and looks great. It did take a couple hours to assemble and I got lost in the directions a couple times. Just pay close attention to detail when assembling. DON’T listen to the people complaining about how difficult it is! If you have basic literary and screwdriver skills you'll be fine. Drama queens.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: First, the delivery came 4 days early which worked out perfectly for me. It was very easy to put together and can be done by one person. Only tools needed are hammer and phillips head screwdriver. It is pretty heavy and is quite solid once assembled. Does not wobble or shift. And it is bottom heavy so it doesn't seem prone to tip over, however there is an "L" bracket included that can be screwed into a wall stud for additional safety, especially when small children are around. It is also a bit bigger than I envisioned, which was another happy surprise. Very, very pleased with this bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Solid, quality materials and design
customer_reviews.text: I love how solid this book shelf is! It's way bigger than I expected, and I love it! It took a long time for me to put together on my own, and being a small female, that made this a challenge, but it came with decent enough directions. I was worried that it was too pricey, and couldn't find anything similar enough, but now that I have it together, the solidness and quality are worth the price! I LOVE this bookshelf! Amazon has been ify lately with quality, so I felt the need to write this review because this is a solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Find a friend
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is everything I wanted. Looks just as pictured. Holds a lot. The one thing I will say is that it is a pain to put together. Get a friend or someone to help you build it. Make sure you have a hammer. The instructions are easy to follow it’s just getting the pieces all together that can get frustrating. I would have probably had an easier time if I’d used a drill. It’s also very heavy. Overall great buy just find a buddy, grab some beers and prepare yourself for a journey harder than that of putting ikea furniture together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want one in every room!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a few months now and I just had to come write a review over it. This unit takes time and care to assemble. However, when complete, it's gorgeous! We have books in every area except the bottom right (blankets). I love the top area to put flowers and photo frames. The detail of the label holders is cute. I don't use the labels but everyone says it reminds them of an old card catalog. Since I'm a librarian, it makes a charming detail. No scratches to speak of (and I have two children).
customer_reviews.author: MamaPete

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design, slight defects in execution
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were funny and easy to follow, but some of the pieces weren't correct. Two of the H2 shelves didn't have hole to put the anchor pieces in, I had to poke my own. The wood looks nice, but it's just a veneer on press board. The lock and nails don't fit the press board holes correctly, and pull out immediately even if locked, which is worrisome if I ever move. The backing doesn't line up 100 percent to the back, meaning tapping the nails in split the veneer in 6+ spots, which is really upsetting. It's gorgeous and heavy, but it's not really an elegant piece once put all together.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Good value, takes time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is very cute and I'm glad I bought it. Pros: good value, nice detailing, very sturdy since it has many small sections. Cons: LOTS of steps to out it together, shelves are not adjustable and not very tall. My husband and I assembled it together, and it took us over four hours. Not for the faint-hearted. It holds a lot, but the shelves are too short to hold an upright standard photo album, which was a bummer. Still, it's very cute and sturdy. I would buy it again (once the memory of the assmbly process fades)!
customer_reviews.author: Lynardo

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to have a drill and stiff drink on hand.
customer_reviews.text: What a pain in the $$$ to assemble. The instructions were great and everything was packaged/labeled very well, but do yourself a favor and use a drill (even though the instructions say not to - it’s fine) and poor yourself a stiff drink. Oh, and make sure to set aside at least two hours. Believe it or not, the most time consuming part was nailing the board to the back as the pre-drilled holes are misaligned. Overall pretty darn happy with this at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Packaged very well and that makes me HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase came with a little damage to the outer packaging but my beautiful bookcase was unharmed and that makes me HAPPY. The bookcase is beautiful and sturdy it was a great buy. It was easy to put together, but it took a long time. I will probably buy another I'm just dreading putting it together already. I do recommend this product it is beautiful and arrived with NO damage!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Item came damaged but we've already started putting it together and it's so heavy we are not sending it back. Also went on sale for $60 cheaper than what I paid for it right when I received it. Cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy nice looking bookcases
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these bookcases. I only gave it 4 stars for ease of assembly not as a criticism but these are large pieces of furniture so having two people was really helpful. Laying everything out and getting organized first is important. Being able to lift the bookcases up and move them into place is easier with two people. The second one went together much faster after the experience with the first one. Once they were in place...well they were exactly what I wanted. I love them. I'm planning on buying another piece from the company.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembly steps, but each is easy.
customer_reviews.text: Built this last night and this morning. Love it. I'd rate it a "more difficult than average" but only because there are many pieces. Each step was simple. The quality is great. Reading the instructions, I became concerned it would be unstable unless it was mounted adjacent to a wall, and secured to the wall. I'm using this bookcase in the middle of a room, to separate my office from the basement cat box zone. No worries (at least for me, as I have no visitors that might try to climb on the product)--it seems quite sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: MAF

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Although this arrived damaged, the company quickly replaced the piece that was scratched. Their customer service support staff is super friendly and helpful. I have assembled plenty of furniture and this one got me twice. Read instructions carefully and make sure you have everything in the right direction. (I know...thank you, Captain Obvious...but really.) Once it’s assembled it looks great and is actually pretty sturdy. I can’t wait to fill it with books and knickknacks!
customer_reviews.author: Pilot0822

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Unit
customer_reviews.text: It was an absolute bear to get the box up two flights of steps (so heavy!) and it nearly took up the whole floor of the small office I was going to put it in, but everything was worth it. It is a stunning piece of furniture. Everything was incredibly well built and crafted. It took a while to assemble, however, that's because it has a lot of things going on with it! Once it's all set up, it looks absolutely stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered in a big heavy box, and I needed help moving it into the house. Once I opened the box, the top piece was cracked. I decided to put it together anyway with hopes of it not being noticeable. The trim pieces hide the crack somewhat, so it isn’t so bad. I would rate it 5 stars if not cracked upon delivery. It’s a good sturdy piece that fits perfectly with my living room.
customer_reviews.author: MBanksie

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and will hopefully last a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bookshelf, it looks great when it's all together. It took me about 4 hours, mostly on my own; however, having a friend to help is vital as the bookcase is heavy when fully assembled. The directions are good, but double check all the placements before you tighten the cams or place the nails. The old saying "measure twice, cut once" applies except it's check twice hammer once!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not intuitive & needs better Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd Sauder purchase, and I'm not sure I will buy another one of their products. Lots of pieces, and lengthy, awkward assembly (like screws from the back-side of the decorative "lips"). There were already minor scratches on some of the pieces when it arrived (not shipping damage). That being said, it's almost worth it when you are done. It looks nice and appears sturdy. I just don't know if it's worth all the trouble for the money. If I could have given it 2.5 stars, I would have.
customer_reviews.author: P. deVarennes

customer_reviews.title: Buckle Up and Bunker Down for Assembly
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and has easy to follow instructions.... HOWEVER, it will take up 2-3 hours and I highly recommend 2 people to work on this beast. The screws that are needed to secure the bracketed top stripped under both hand and power tools. Some holes were not the best in all wood was removed/fit screws and needed elbow grease to make it work. But, in the end, I am happy with the product and love the amount of storage. I found mainstay or 5 below fabric tots fit the cubbies/bottom shelves. When done it is very heavy and has no slide on carpet so make it close to spot you want it to go.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Davis

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's ok. Put it together, which is pretty easy if you read the directions HOWEVER the screws needed to fasten the bottom piece were missing so that part looks like crap and I can't put anything on the bookcase till I get the right screws :/ But it's pretty solid and a nice, neutral colors.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyer1968

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Upgraded Look
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 of these bookcases. The color is great. I recommend planning to slowly work on this for a couple of days. The shelves are not adjustable which is my preference because you then don’t have holes showing. Gives a cleaner look. The molding also gives this piece a more upgraded look. I put the bookcases together by myself (50 something female) and just needed help lifting up once done.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Simply Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a middle-aged woman and have never before assembled a piece of furniture. I was able to do this all by myself in 4 hours with no difficulty. It is rather heavy, though, which is good because it's solid, but I got help turning it over to proceed with the assembly. The instructions are crystal clear. I feel great about my purchase. It's GORGEOUS! It makes a perfect background for Bleak House Bookshop Instagram posts.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Andersen

customer_reviews.title: the instructions were perfect and I was able to put it together by ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bookshelf because I has a very limited walking space between a bed and the wall. I needed something to put my TV on in the bedroom. All I can say, is WOW, it looks fabulous, fits depthwise to 12", it looks way more expensive than it was, the instructions were perfect and I was able to put it together by myself and I am a 63 year old woman. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my bookcase! In fact I loved it so much I bought a second one! It's not hard to assemble it's just a lot of steps and is time consuming, but easy to follow instructions are included. We have them both in our study, and we have received several compliments on our bookshelves and people love how they are labeled by genre!
customer_reviews.author: Abby A.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and practical bookcase
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a "big boy" bookcase for our 6 year old son to replace his children's bookcase. It is the right height for him to be able to reach all the books. It can hold lots of books and the size for each cube is just right to categorize the books. The label is helpful for him as he is learning to put things back where they belong.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Broken Piece Immediately After opening
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this bookcase but unfortunately there was a broken piece as soon as we opened it. I have been unable to get ahold of anyone from the manufacturing company to try to get a new one shipped but who knows how long that will be. Im so disappointed and hoping the manufacturer will fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Quality, sturdy, good color
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality!!! It came boxed up tigt with lots of styrofoam, so idk how other reviewers received any damaged parts... it’s heavier so it’s nice and sturdy. I was overwhelmed at first with all the screws and giant booklet of instructions, but it’s a simple step by step. It’s very hard to mess up and ends up straight and held tight together. It fits a lot of storage bins available on Amazon too which is nice. I use it under my tv as a media cabinet and am loving it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goode

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit but perfect
customer_reviews.text: Have a closet with a dimension that was about 1/8" larger than the cabinet's online specs. Had to remove door casing and floor trim to get it in, but it's perfect. It took about 4 hours to assemble and install (has a lot of parts) and had to redo one shelf that I put in backward (doh!), and 4 hours includes the trim and casing removal, trimming, and replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Cubbies for books and toys
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this bookcase for our sons nursery. We were looking for something that can grow with him or that we could possibly use somewhere else in the house when he got a little older. This is a heavy piece with wall anchors. One thing that we really like is that we can use this for his books but also for baskets, stuffed animals, and small toys. We could not be happier with the way it looks in the room!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelf Damaged in transit
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful shelving unit, even though it is about an inch longer than the description stated. (So it does not fit where we wanted it. We found a place for it thought) It is very classy and easy to put together. However it takes about 4-5 hours to put together. My only complaint is there is a bit of damage on the top that happened before it got to our house. However have mad a runner to put on the top that hides it. If I could pick it up or know that it would not get damaged in transit I would buy a second one for the front room.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Deisher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: We are using this as a tv stand because we needed more storage than most tv stands allow. It works well. Some pieces arrived damaged, but they don’t show once assembled. I like that it came with an attachment to the wall to prevent it from falling on kids. Assembly took about 25 minutes. It was very heavy. We drilled some extra holes to run cords through, but it came with 2 pre-drilled holes.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is much better quality that I had expected. The bookcase is also larger than I expected, but we didn't look at dimensions or anything. This bookcase is sturdy, high quality for the price, and looks great. The only tools needed to assemble were a hammer and a screwdriver. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel VanWinkle

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Assembly from top down. Extremely heavy so cannot be assembled in place. Top shelving constantly swaying during assembly because sides put on last breaks easily while swaying. Not all parts labeled. Definitely a do not buy. Looks pretty but not worth the trouble. Mine fell apart and broke during assembly
customer_reviews.author: JEAN M. Halsey

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is impossible to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this shelf a less than one star, it looks beautiful in the picture, and the wood is beautiful none the less but when trying to put it together it is a nightmare. I followed the instructions step bu step by step, and still when I stood it up it tumbled over and down the stair well that was next to it, putting scratches in my newly done walls. I am giving a word of caution.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanita Hueffmeier

customer_reviews.title: Don’t assemble on carpet with toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble (I wouldn’t recommend assembly on carpet) however there were some gaps I wish weren’t there ( probably because I assembled it on carpet) but over all without the late delivery and interruptions on toddlers this was a fairly easy and enjoyable build. Wish the backing was all one piece though. But I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin Benson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, aesthetic but deep gash. Better packaging suggested.
customer_reviews.text: Pros - sturdy, nice clean look, spacious. Cons - takes awhile to build and could have been set up better for doing so. Packaging should be improved. My shelf came with a deep gash in the top of it. I was in need of shelving immediately (very small kitchen) so I didnt contact the company. It vould have been avoided with better packaging though.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love this bookcase.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this bookcase. it's very sturdy and looks great in my knew room. It had a small scuff on the top when I got it put together but I covered it with decorations. I added some cute grey and white stripped fabric Cube organizers to it and it looks great. I was hoping it would have more gray tones in it but it is more brown. Still looks great and I would definitely recommend this .
customer_reviews.author: Esther Portela

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After shopping around for a while trying to find the right storage shelf for my son I finally found this and fell in love. I received it last week, it took a while to put together by myself but it was not too difficult. It looks amazing in my son's room for his toys. I am a little worried about the material, it seems like the edges will scuff/wear pretty easily. However, I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Powell

customer_reviews.title: HPoy
customer_reviews.text: took husband an hr and a half to assemble. Went smoothly and he wasn't frustrated which is always good. I'm not sure what people are expecting for 150.00 but I'm pleased. I got it to organize my sons learning supplies, books, and puzzles. Anything you buy in this price point is going to be particle board.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this. The quality, design, everything! And for only $150?! I've been looking for a piece like this for months and couldn't even find a piece I liked half this much for over $800! My favorite piece of furniture I've ever bought. Took about 2 hours to build, but it was super easy and totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy
customer_reviews.text: I paid 139.00 for this and for the price it is ok but it is very much a wimpy piece of furniture. Made of particle board. There needs to be a better way to attach the back... the nail are seen and make split the "wood" of the cubbies if you do not hit it directly in the middle and you cant SEE what you are hammering into.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Banks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Shelf/Furniture!
customer_reviews.text: The price has increased in the last 30 days... I would Not pay more than $170.00 for this unit. Do not pay "Covid" prices, please. This particular piece was OOS for about 3 weeks - They have since increased the price by $20.00. This is a Good quality piece of furniture for $170.00, or less. Anything more than $170.00 is Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to build, but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookshelf! It adds a classy yet simple touch to my library. I’m deducting a star because it is super heavy to move around (boxed and built), and building it is difficult too. One of the wooden parts that came with it was imperfect, but the seller was quick to assist and send over a replacement. If you can get past those hurdles, you’re still looking at a bookcase that will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as we expected and more!
customer_reviews.text: While this bookcase took my husband longer than we thought to assemble, we are completely satisfied with the result and it was just what I needed for my home office! We would definitely purchase again and are completely happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tjones

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute bookcase! I purchased to use as a book and toy organizer for my living room. I was super disappointed that it came with scratches and small chunks missing from the finish. When opened the box (length ways) you could see 2 of the small damages right away. It seemed like it was packed well and no damage to the box itself so my best guess it it was damaged before it was packed and shipped. A bit frustrating for the cost but is an immediate need so I do not have time to send it back and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't put this together myself, I would have never known was a flat pack! Excellent quality and strong connections between shelves. Took me about 2 hours to put together with the help of an extra set of hands here and there. Looks really sharp as a TV stand/bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: A Few Fixes Needed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bookshelf!! it looks good once assembled, it's sturdy and holds more than expected. I gave it only 3 because the screws are cheap, I stripped the tops of them while screwing them in by hand. The other star missing was because they could be labeled better and some weren't even labeled. Other than those two things is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: TC Patten

customer_reviews.title: Good storage
customer_reviews.text: This was well labeled when putting together. My only complaint is that the screws were cheap and the "wood" outside chipped off easier than expected. We have a few small pieces missing on corners and edges, but it still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: B. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Worth $100(ish), but not much more than that
customer_reviews.text: What I expected. The shelving units are made of particle board. We ordered 2 of these units. Both arrived damaged. Both have small random holes drilled by the factory, but nothing that goes there according to the directions. They are incredibly heavy. Mailing them back is not worth it. Over all we are happy. If the price was higher, I’d be upset. We shopped around and Amazon had the cheapest price with free Prime shipping. Beating the other retailers by a long shot. Again, the only downfall ordering these online as aposed to from a brick store like WalMart is returning them. It would be a Hassel either way though.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Manga Collection Bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this piece look fantastic, but it houses almost all of my manga. I love that the top can be used for additional storage of my knickknacks. So far my cats haven't figured out how to climb it. The first one took me about four hours to assemble (I took breaks to write). The second one still took me three hours. But the instructions are clear - all pictures with labels. You'll need a hammer and a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Alley

customer_reviews.title: Missing a back panel
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Sauder piece that I’ve bought. I’ve been completely happy with the quality of the other three, and WOULD be happy with the quality of this piece too if it wasn’t missing one of the back panels- the reason I only rated it 3 stars. It is very sturdy and I was able to assemble it by myself in two hours in a somewhat small space. The piece would be absolutely beautiful and I would’ve rated it 5 stars if I could’ve finished it. Hopefully I’ll be able to contact Sauder and get the missing piece sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: luka tsuki

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own screws
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to go to the hardware store to buy better screws. The screws were absolutely junk and stripped after turning them twice. It's also a little unstable. Otherwise it looks wonderful and fits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KLN

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great buy....and STURDY construction. Assembly was a two-person job but, lance we sorted out the pieces and actually followed the directions AS PRINTED...the rest was a piece of cake! V We would definitely repurchase this product, if the need arose
customer_reviews.author: Quantie 5000

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is beautiful. We, however, are using it under our T.V., which hangs on the wall, as we needed something that would fit a small area. It isn't as wide as regular T.V. stands, but tall and holds the DVD player and Dish receiver on the bottom ( had to cut an extra hole for cords ). Other shelves hold DVD's, and misc. decor. Just the right size for a small space that holds a lot of things. Sturdy, easy to put together. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: It took a long 5 hours to put together. I have decided I am too old for unassembled furniture. I will never live long enough to get those hours back. The instructions could have had more detail. Some sadistic assembly line worker neglected to drill two holes in part H. I will have to drill the holes myself. Should get a discount. Also, some of the parts were badly handlettered. O, D.??? No letter stickers? Would not purchase again. It is a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi P.

customer_reviews.title: Item came without any hardware
customer_reviews.text: The item was delivered without any hardware to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Stodghill

customer_reviews.title: very strudy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bookcase. Have it setup in the mancave and all shelves are loaded with books, Blurays, DVD collections, and video games. Very sturdy and look really nice. I already had the salt oak Sauder computer desk so it matched everything else I really needed some storage/shelving in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: This was the second one I ordered...
customer_reviews.text: The first one is great, sturdy, nice looking, etc. So this year I ordered another - arrived with both ends of the box broken, missing and damaged pieces. Had to send it back. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Robust
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bigger than I expected it to be. But other than that this bookcase is great. It is sturdy and was not that difficult to set up. It has multiple compartments where you can store petty much anything not just books. I am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Pratiksha Giri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome book shelf
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and decent looking!! Only one thing worried is that the edge of front bars is a little bit sharp for kids as shown in pictures attached. Be aware However overall quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN.L

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase so much that I Instagrammed it. It's a bit taller than I was expecting, but it is perfect and exactly what I was looking for. Took my husband about 1.5 hours to assemble, but I think it would have taken him longer if not for me standing over him giving him advice and pointers along the way. He loves when I do that.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Smith Mount

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: You move frequently do not buy this. You can't assemble again. This is worse than Ikea product. Very very low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Aweful. The instructions were terrible. Most pieces were not or mislabeled. Had many missing parts. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcase
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these, one each for two bedrooms. The assembly is not terribly easy but not overly hard either. Lots of screws need put in, and some from odd angles. I expect it would be about the same for any bookcase. We made a few mistakes that we had to take apart and redo but that was on us, not the instructions. The bookcases are very heavy but they are sturdy once you get them where you want. They look very nice and we have had a lot of compliments on them. Very happy with the purchase, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't gave as much room as I thought but it looks great. Color is a bit driftwood like which works ...
customer_reviews.text: I live this piece. It doesn't gave as much room as I thought but it looks great. Color is a bit driftwood like which works very well for my seashore bedroom. It is strong, well made and was relatively easy to put together. I did have to use a drill on the long screws due to limited strength in my hands. I may get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Classy. Complicated. Like me.
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this bookcase. It’ll house my art supplies and comic books. As others have stated it took several hours to put together. And if you aren’t careful some of the corners will chip during construction. But the instructions are very clear and thorough! Way better than ikea instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Moore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Directions were great. Only gave three stars for easy to assemble because there are a lot of shelves. Worth the effort. Definitely would recommend view in room before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: AngieN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bookcase! So happy with my purchase. When the box first arrived the top board had damage from the shipping. It was so easy to go to the Sauder website and order the single piece I needed with no changes or questions. You don’t even have to talk to anyone. Super easy! This is the second piece of furniture a have gotten from Sauder and will continue to buy their products when I need good quality furniture. It was quite easy to put together as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Though it has a lot of parts to assemble, this book self is definitely study. Have moved it around a few times and it fell over once and it is still sturdy. looks good and not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Collins Clan

customer_reviews.title: Great for fabric storage
customer_reviews.text: Not fun to put together but the directions were good. I am using this to store my fabric stash, works wonderfully for this. I got rid of several plastic storage bins and now the fabric is easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: It is good, but I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: the manufacturer has marked the board consistently. Some boards have marks on the top, some are marked on the edges, some don't have marks at all and I had to figure out which one was which when I was not in a mood to play puzzle. After it is finished, it does stand well after I load it full of books.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 2 person assembly
customer_reviews.text: It took two girls to put this together. Probably two hours. But when we got it together it looked awesome it takes 12 of the 12x12 fabric bins. It took two females to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking shelf & very roomy. You will need help putting it together because it is a little hard. After it's together though it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered 2, but glad I did! (only one pictured). I put these bins in them to match my classy Walmart curtains:
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Take your time when assembling unless you're an expert.
customer_reviews.text: I have a seven year old grandson and I keep toys, books and games at my house for him. I bought this unit so that I could keep all of those items together in one place. I put games on the bottom shelves where they fit very well. He also has Lego sets and many books. They go on the other shelves. I'm a 77 year old grandmother and was able to put this unit together with a slight bit of help from my son. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Not too difficult, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Take your time putting it together and it's fine. I did it slowly over the course of 1-2 days because plans kept popping up, and had no issues with assembly or sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: JCD81

customer_reviews.title: I bought this bookshelf because I loved the look
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bookshelf because I loved the look, it's not an ordinary looking bookshelf. It was a little hard to put together, luckily I had help. But, I love it! It looks beautiful, and holds lots of books. The ashy wood color is beautiful, too. I am just thrilled with the finished product!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Great storage/organizational piece!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Sauder piece I have purchased. It is perfect for our basement with kids toys. Lots of space to keep them organized. Very easy to assembe and very sturdy to withstand a 2 and 5 yo. I plan to find some clear storage bins so you can still see the beautiful wood coloring and the toys. I would recommend this bookshelf!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is very pretty. It is top heavy so be sure to use the tabs to secure to the wall. The back is just cardboard which was disheartening.
customer_reviews.author: Selena P Moretz

product_meta.title: Sauder Barrister Lane Bookcase, Iron Oak finish
product_meta.description: Color:Iron Oak Finish| Design:BookcaseGet clever with your clutter and organize it with this bookcase from the barrister lane collection. This handsome bookcase features ten cubbyhole storage options for you to store, organize, and display your favorite collection of novels, photos of family and friends, decorative plants or bins full of miscellaneous home essentials. The options are endless! Each cubbyhole accommodates an ID label tag to keep you organized and mess free. You can tag Each cubbyhole for the family So everything has its place and you can find it when you need it. It also features a top shelf gallery display for you to showcase anything from awards and achievements to candles and a decorative lamp. Finished in a stunning iron oak, this versatile bookcase adds style and functionality to any room in your home.
feature_bullets: Cubbyhole storage for books, binders, framed photos, collectibles, and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars797 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
